name: Invocation: Entity Researchers
description:
Civilization almost collapsed... We found ourselves powerless, the entities destroyed everything in their path. All conventional weaponry was useless...

Only when we discovered what they were would we be given the means to fight back.

We clawed back from the brink of annihilation...

But our fight is far from over.

We are the Entity Investigation and Research Institute.

Through EIRI's research we are now on the frontline against the entities. The ERX Bioroid was co-developed by EIRI and Silyeog Genetics. Using genetic material from the Visitors we built an effective weapon. Connecting remotely, our Research Technicians respond using the ERX, this can assure our efficient response to any Visitor reports we receive.

You are EIRI's newest Research Technician, tasked with controlling your ERX unit and battling the Visitors, researching as much as we can about the entities.


A challenging JRPG with a varied list of enemies and items to discover.

Scan the entities to add them to your EIRINet database!

Refine Ores into items to strengthen your Loadout. Extract information from Ores with the EIRI growth machine to learn new moves or collect new skill cards. Man-made items can be purchased on the EIRINet market, all transactions use RES, the research you gain for scanning and defeating enemies.

Features:

  • 160 entities to research
  • 60 bosses!
  • 10 ultra-rare Visitors
  • Over 150 items
  • Over 60 skill cards
  • Unlock over 20 moves 
  • Timed turn-based battle system
  • Send Patrols to collect loot
  • Over 90 achievements
  • Over 30 songs recorded live on analog synths!
  • Loads of other stuff!
